availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James L. James Jr (Lyon County, Kentucky, iron works manager)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, iron works manager. New Jersey native. Married to Eliza Ann Smith James in Montgomery County, Tennessee, on July 6, 1847. Father of Betty James Wilson, Mary Henry James Steele, Hannah F. James, Susan E. James, James L. James, Edward H. James, and Charles Clarence James. Iron works manager in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 755.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Montgomery County Marriages, 1838-1874, p. 52-3.
"J. L. James Sr. (1827-1904)," Find A Grave, Memorial #135662888, accessed November 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/135662888.
